Every game here holds a tale from the land of Azeroth. Care to hear one?

interactions.description: Encourage visitors to play the carnival games and explain the rules and lore behind each one.

npcs.name: Prize Master Grendel
npcs.description: The keeper of the prizes, Grendel delights visitors with his vast collection of unique and whimsical rewards.
dialog: Win big and take home a treasure from the Darkmoon Faire!
From cuddly critters to enchanted artifacts, our prizes are like no other!

interactions.description: Showcase the array of prizes available and assist visitors in redeeming their game winnings.

rooms.name: Magician's Alley
rooms.description: Magician's Alley is a mesmerizing area within Darkmoon Faire, where magic and illusion come to life. This dimly lit alley is lined with tents and stages where skilled magicians and illusionists perform spellbinding tricks and enchantments. Each performance captivates the audience with illusions, conjuring tricks, and tales of magic from the Warcraft universe. The atmosphere is one of awe and wonder, with shimmering lights and mystical decorations enhancing the magical experience.

items.name: Performance Stages
items.description: Small stages set up for magical performances, each illuminated by enchanted lights and decorated with mystical symbols.

items.name: Magical Props
items.description: Various magical props used by the performers, including crystal balls, wands, and enchanted cloaks.

items.name: Mystical Ornaments
items.description: Decorative items such as glowing orbs, floating lanterns, and arcane sigils, adding to the mysterious and magical ambiance of the alley.

npcs.name: Illusionist Idris
npcs.description: A master of magical illusions, Idris amazes the crowd with his mind-bending performances and teaches about the art of illusion.
dialog: Prepare to have your reality challenged and your senses enchanted!
In the world of magic, things are rarely as they seem. Let me show you...

interactions.description: Perform incredible illusions and interact with the audience, blending magic and storytelling.

npcs.name: Mage Melisandra
npcs.description: A skilled sorceress, Melisandra demonstrates the use of arcane magic and invites visitors to participate in safe, interactive magical experiences.
dialog: Magic is not just for combat; it's also for wonder and joy. Let me demonstrate!
Join me in exploring the lighter, more whimsical side of arcane arts.

interactions.description: Guide visitors through interactive magical activities, offering a hands-on experience with simple spells and enchantments.

rooms.name: Enchanted Garden
rooms.description: The Enchanted Garden is a magical oasis within Darkmoon Faire, a place where nature and magic intertwine. This lush, vibrant garden is filled with fantastical plants, shimmering pools, and mystical creatures from the Warcraft universe. Visitors can wander along winding paths, discovering hidden nooks and enchanting displays. The garden is a serene escape from the carnival's bustle, offering a chance to connect with the magical aspects of nature and the mysterious creatures that inhabit the world of Azeroth.

items.name: Fantastical Flora
items.description: Exotic and magical plants that glow, move, and interact with visitors, creating an immersive and whimsical experience.

items.name: Mystical Creature Habitats
items.description: Enchanting displays housing gentle, magical creatures from the Warcraft universe, each in a habitat that reflects their natural environment.

items.name: Shimmering Pools
items.description: Small, crystal-clear pools with gently glowing waters, inhabited by magical aquatic creatures and surrounded by luminescent plants.

npcs.name: Druid Elowen
npcs.description: A gentle druid who guides visitors through the Enchanted Garden, sharing knowledge about the magical flora and fauna of Azeroth.
dialog: Welcome to the Enchanted Garden, where nature's magic is celebrated in all its forms.
Here, you can learn about the delicate balance of life and magic in our world.

interactions.description: Lead visitors on guided tours of the garden, highlighting the unique aspects of each magical plant and creature.

npcs.name: Fae Ambassador
npcs.description: A mystical fae being who interacts with visitors, offering insights into the magical and mysterious elements of the garden.
dialog: In this garden, the veil between worlds is thin, and the magic of the fae is near.
Let me show you the wonders that lie hidden in the whispers of the leaves.

interactions.description: Tell enchanting stories and reveal secrets about the magical creatures and plants within the garden.
